page.description: This function doesn't exist anymore. The A5_FileAttributeHelper() function displays the Select File Attribute dialog and returns the selected attribute codes.
page.syntax: File_Attributes as C = A5_FileAttributeHelper( Default_Selection as C )

argument.name: File_Attributes
argument.description: One or more file attributes to be used as arguments in a TABLE.OPEN().

argument.name: Default_Selection
argument.description: Optional. Default = "". The initial selection to display in the dialog box.
